```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)
```
```{r}
attendance <- read_csv("attendance.csv")
```
```{r}
head(attendance)
```
now we are going to create attendance differentials 
```{r}
 top10 <- attendance %>% 
  mutate(change = ((`2018` - `2013`)/`2013`)*100
  ) %>%
     arrange(desc(`change`)) %>%
  top_n(10)
  
```

now im creating a bar chart of the top 10 schools
```{r}
ggplot() + 
  geom_bar(data=top10, aes(x=reorder(Institution, `change`), weight=`change`)) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels=comma) +
  coord_flip()

```
